name: MLRegressorMetrics
desc: Metrics you use to evaluate a regressor’s performance.

items.name: var maximumError: Double
items.desc: The largest absolute difference between the expected values and the model's predicted values during testing or training.

items.name: var rootMeanSquaredError: Double
items.desc: A common metric used to determine the deviation between correct and predicted values.

items.name: var isValid: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the regressor model was able to calculate metrics.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error present when the metrics are invalid.

items.name: init(maximumError: Double, rootMeanSquaredError: Double)
items.desc: Creates regressor metrics describing the quality of your model.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the regressor metrics.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the regressor metrics that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the regressor metrics shown in a playground.
